amendment.description: Amendment inserts a new title IX to allow the Forest Service added flexibility in implementing a salvage logging plan on lands affected by the California Rim Fire while protecting sensitive areas and maximizing revenue to fund reforestation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part A of House Report 113-340 to amend Title IX of the bill to allow the Forest Service added flexibility to implement a salvage logging plan on lands affected by the Rim Fire while protecting sensitive areas and maximizing revenue to fund reforestation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. McClintock.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
